Entries.winter_Wed: I saw a snow rabbit early this morning! They're rare, aren't they?
Entries.winter_Thu: I'm having a hard time finding fresh food to eat.#$e#I've been eating a lot of bread.$s
Entries.winter_Thu6: *Sigh*... It's hard to get fresh food in the winter.#$e#I bet your farm is pretty well stocked with food, huh?
Entries.winter_Fri: Time seems to move slower here.#$e#When I lived in the city, the year went by so fast.
Entries.winter_Fri6: Do you ever get cold in that farmhouse of yours?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you want to huddle under one of my quilts and drink cider.$h
Entries.winter_Sat2: Hello, @. Is there something you wanted to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun: Do you ever take a whole day off?#$e#It's a refreshing break.

Entries.Mon: Hi... Everything okay?
Entries.Mon4: I've learned a lot from my parrot family...#$b#But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know.$s
Entries.Tue: When Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.#$e#Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha...$h
Entries.Wed: ...Sorry... I'm shy today.$3
Entries.Wed2: Be careful in the volcano... the spirits don't like outsiders.
Entries.Thu: Have you met the others like you?#$b#I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with my own kind...$3
Entries.Fri: One time... I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away.#$b#I wonder if there are other bird families out there?$3
Entries.Fri3: I wonder if I could see your home from the top of the volcano?
Entries.Sat: ...I'm sad today.$s#$e#You go on... have fun. Let me be sad.$s
Entries.Sun: When it rains, strange birds visit.#$b#I try to speak to them... but they fly away.$s#$b#I guess they don't want to be friends...$s

Entries.LeoDeparture: I need to find some place to live...$s#$b#But I have a plan... I'm going to rely on my friends.
Entries.Thu8: It felt bad at first... to leave the island and set foot in a strange land.$s#$e#But, I got used to it after a while.#$b#I'm a very flexible person!$h
Entries.Thu10: I felt like a stranger here, at first. But I've made a lot of friends!$h#$b#For once, I feel like I belong...
Entries.Tue: Miss Penny is doing her best to get me up to speed in my schooling. She's really nice...#$e#...Luckily, I remember some things from my old, old life... before washing up on the island... so it's not as difficult as it could be.#$e#Miss Penny says she's impressed with how much I know!
Entries.Tue10: I'm sure Jas and Vincent thought I was weird, at first. I accidentally squawked at the school table a few times... that didn't help.$s#$e#It was a big change for everyone. But we're good friends now!$h
Entries.18: When I first arrived, Linus made me a suit out of leaves, like his...#$b#But I looked funny... like a fuzzy mango!$h#$e#I think I'll stick to my feathers.
Entries.Wed: Between Linus and Miss Penny, I'm going to learn everything there is to learn!$h#$e#Mayor Lewis says I'm on the fast track to becoming a 'well-rounded citizen'... whatever that means.
Entries.Thu: Have you ever noticed all the interesting birds that live here?#$e#If you listen closely, they might tell you something.
Entries.winter_Thu: The birds of this valley don't mind the cold so much.#$e#I'm a little jealous of their warm coats...$s
Entries.4: I saw a big mango floating in the sky. Linus told me it was a hot-air balloon!$u#$b#I thought only birds could fly...
Entries.Fri: Linus has been teaching me about all the wild food in the valley. There's a lot of good stuff out here!$h#$e#Though... I do kind of miss having golden walnuts for breakfast every morning...$s
Entries.winter_Fri: Linus taught me how to make a special spice berry rubbed fish...#$b#He says if I eat enough of it it'll keep me warm this winter!$h
Entries.Fri8: Uncle Linus says I should 'cook' my fish before eating it...$s#$b#I'm having a hard time getting used to it... so dry...$s
Entries.Mon: Hey, @. Nice to see you back on the island, just like old times. This is fun!#$e#You know, I was scared when you first arrived... I knew my life was about to change.$u
Entries.Sun: You know, Stardew Valley might be my new home... but the island will always be my home, too.#$e#It's nice to be able to come back and visit.
Entries.Sat: Maybe some day, I'll visit Zuzu City...$u#$b#But I'm not even close to being ready, yet. This world is already so strange to me, and I'm very comfortable here right now!$h
Entries.Sun10: The parrots want me to thank you for all the golden walnuts you've found. They're really enjoying them.$h
Entries.Sat10: @? Um... I'm a little embarrassed to ask...$u#$b#But... do you think Jas would ever like a guy like me?$u#$b#Or am I too weird?$s#$e#Hahaha... who cares. I'll figure it out some day.$h

Entries.Introduction: So, how was your first night in the old cottage?#$e#Your grandpa used to complain about the rickety old bed. But I think, deep down, he actually loved that house.
Entries.Resort: I'm impressed, @. You've really fixed up the place!$h
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Everyone aboard! We're heading back to the valley!
Entries.Resort_Shore: Vacation opportunities like this could really expand the local economy!#$e#I'd better not stay in the sun too long, or my moustache will dry out.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Hehe... look at this place! I don't know how you did it, but this little vacation spot is the talk of the town.$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Hehe... Gus is really in his element.
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: @, I heard what you did for Pam and Penny... now *that's* the kind of community support I love to see in Pelican Town!$h
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: @, did you hear? Someone paid Robin to build Pam and Penny a house! Robin won't tell me who it was, though.#$e#Regardless of who paid, I love seeing this kind of community support in Pelican Town!$h
Entries.willyCrabs: *sniff*... *sniff*... can you smell that? I've been catching hints of fresh crab all day...$u
Entries.cc_Begin: *sniff*... *sniff*... Ah, I sense you've been spending some time in the old Community Center. It's good to know someone's taking care of the place.
Entries.cc_Complete: I've never felt such an overwhelming pride in our community. You've done Pelican Town a great service, @.$h
Entries.cc_Bus: @, did you hear? It seems the old town bus started working again overnight!$h#$b#That old thing has been dormant for decades... This is truly a great mystery.
Entries.joja_Begin: So, the old Community Center is gone... I guess times change, and good things come and go... Yet I can't help but feel a sense of loss.$s#$e#I just hope this doesn't mar my record as Mayor.$s
Entries.Mon: It's a good season to start thinking about gardening, even for us non-farmers.#$e# The valley is known for producing some of the finest spring flowers!$h
Entries.Tue: Just place anything you want to sell in the shipping box next to your house.#$e#I'll be interested in seeing what kinds of things you put in there.
Entries.Tue2: At the start of each season you'll have to remove the previous season's dead crops. It's easiest with a scythe.
Entries.spring_3: Have you planted any spring crops yet? The season doesn't last forever, you know.
Entries.Town_57_40: #$c .3#You're in town early, huh? Finished with your farm chores already?#$e#Good morning! I'm just checking on the garden as usual.$h#$c .5#Hmm... are these aphids?$s#$e#Hmm... I hope these aren't scale bugs...$s
Entries.Wed: Hmm... tax collection... *mumble* ...spring festivities expenses... *mumble*...$u#$e#Yes?
Entries.spring_10: Ah... There's nothing like a strong cup of tea in the morning.
Entries.Thu: The saloon can get pretty lively at night. Sometimes we even put a coin in the jukebox *chuckle*$h#$e#I like to visit once a week or so to catch up on things, anyway.
Entries.Saloon: Good evening! It's nice to see you socializing with the townsfolk.#$b#It's good to stop by once in a while and see what the latest news is.$h
Entries.Saloon4: Good evening, @! I'm glad to see you relaxing at the saloon. It's good for you to take a break now and then.$h#$b#Your grandfather always worked himself too hard... I'll have an extra beer in his honor tonight.
Entries.Fri: I hope things are going well on %farm farm. I'd hate to see it all dried up.
Entries.Sat: Everyone seems a little happier on the weekends, don't you think?#$e#I'm on the job seven days a week, though.
Entries.Sun: I've been Mayor of Pelican Town for over twenty years!#$e#No one ever runs against me when it's time for an election. I like to think that it means I'm doing my job well.#$e#I like being Mayor.
Entries.event_secret1: Thank you @. I won't forget this.
Entries.event_secret2: *sob* ... I can't believe you would do that...$s#$b#You're terrible.$s
Entries.summer_Mon: Gardening is a hobby of mine, so I'm excited for this warm weather.
Entries.summer_Town_57_40: #$c .3#Ah, my flowers are growing wonderfully!$h#$c .3#Good morning! Can you smell the sweet scent of these dew-lilies?#$e#It's early but the air is already quite warm. Summer is nice for an old guy like me hehe.
Entries.summer_Tue: How did I become Mayor in the first place? It's a long story.#$e#We're both too busy for stories right now.
Entries.summer_Wed: The moonlight jellies will be here soon. It's one of my favorite things about the valley.
Entries.summer_Thu: The saloon gets pretty lively at night.#$e#I like to visit once a week or so to catch up on things. And to get a taste of Gus' authentic spaghetti.
Entries.summer_Fri: Hmm... I wonder if it's anyone's birthday today? I'd better check the calendar by Pierre's shop.
Entries.summer_Sat: Everyone seems a little happier on the weekends, don't you think?#$e#I'm on the job seven days a week, though.
Entries.summer_Sun: Say, are you growing any blueberries on your farm?#$e#I do enjoy a fresh blueberry.%revealtasteLewis258
Entries.fall_Mon: Some of the townsfolk are wary of strangers. You'll have to win their trust before they open up to you.#$e#Just be persistent and you'll get through to them.$h
Entries.fall_Tue: It was around this time of year when I first became Mayor, over twenty years ago.#$e#That makes me feel really old.$s
Entries.fall_Wed: If you have any suggestions for the town, just drop a note into my suggestion box.#$e#Oh, that's right... I don't have a suggestion box.
Entries.fall_Wed2: Every Wednesday I have buckwheat waffles and coffee for breakfast. It's a little tradition I keep to keep the bachelor life interesting.$h
Entries.fall_Town_57_40: #$c .3#Hmmm... these strange little mushrooms have been popping up in my wood chips. I wonder what kind they are?#$c .3#Good morning! We're slowly entering the cold months, so I'm seeing my garden to a gentle end.#$e#Ah, you're in town early, huh? Finished with your farm chores already?
Entries.fall_Thu: The saloon gets pretty lively at night.#$e#I like to visit once a week or so to catch up on things.
Entries.fall_Fri: I hope things are going well for you on the farm.
Entries.fall_12: Do you have any bee houses on your farm?#$e#If you place them near flowers you can get different types of honey.
Entries.fall_19: Sometimes you can tell if there's something buried underground. Just keep your eyes open.
Entries.fall_Fri4: Have you tried Gus' 'secret' spaghetti sauce?$s#$b#...The ingredients may be secret, but the smell isn't.#$b#I'll see you later.
Entries.fall_Sun: Are you doing your best on the farm, @? You'll have to accomplish things in many areas if you want to become a well-rounded citizen.
Entries.winter_1: Well, winter is here! That means the townspeople will be spending most of their days indoors.#$e#At least you'll know where to find them!$h
Entries.winter_Mon: Another year is almost over!#$e#I hope you had a productive year!
Entries.winter_Tue: I've got to start coming up with a plan for improving our town next year!
Entries.winter_Wed: I'll still come by every night to collect your produce, even in the snow.#$e#You still need to make money in the winter!
Entries.winter_Fri: I hope things are going well for you on the farm.
Entries.winter_Fri6: I've never been married. I have no family. All I live for is to be Mayor.$s#$e#Is it worth it?$s#$e#...*sigh*...$s
Entries.winter_Sun: Hi there, @! How're you doing today?$h#$e#If you see Marnie, tell her I say 'hi'.

Entries.Introduction: A stranger?... Hello.#$e#Don't mind me. I just live out here alone.
Entries.reject_869: What do you have there? Looks like it would make good bait.$h
Entries.cc_Boulder: My old friend, the glimmering boulder, has moved on. It may not seem like an important event, but to me it's a big change.#$b#I'm happy for the old rock to see more of the world, though.$h
Entries.MovieInvitation: Oh... me? I usually wouldn't, but... okay. It's nice of you to think about me.#$b#I'll head over there in a little while.
Entries.Mon: The crisp air of the wilderness is all I care to know.#$e#I live out here by choice.
Entries.Tue: ...Have you come to ridicule me?#$e#I'm just minding my own business.
Entries.Wed: I don't know you well enough to trust you. Sorry.
Entries.Thu: ...Hmm? Do you want something from me?
Entries.Fri: Please don't destroy my tent.#$e#It's happened before.$s
Entries.Sat: I'm happy by myself, you know.#$e#I don't need new friends.
Entries.Sun4: It would be nice if the townspeople could accept me for who I am.$s#$b#I like living out here in the open air. That's what they don't understand.
Entries.Tue4: You can learn to survive in the wild. I have.#$e#I think we all have a hidden urge to return to nature. It's just a little scary to make the leap.
Entries.Wed6: I spend a lot of time thinking.#$e#If you can fully understand the reasons behind your thoughts, you'll have reached a new level of being.
Entries.Wed2: I have to be wary of strangers. Most people don't like a 'wild man'.
Entries.Thu4: The people here seem nice, but they avoid me.#$e#People are afraid of the unknown.$u
Entries.Fri4: You can learn a lot from trees.#$b#Spend time with them and they might tell you their secrets.#$e#Go in peace, young one.
Entries.Sat4: I have everything I need to survive, and more. Nature plays a wonderful tune if you can only learn to listen.#$e#I also spend a lot of time reading. One of the reasons I stopped in the valley was for the great library.
Entries.Sun: #$1 linusVandal#Someone was throwing rocks at my tent last night... I just had to wait it out.$s$k#$e#I don't like to stay in one place for too long. There's just too much to experience in the world.
Entries.summer_Mon4: During all these years I've discovered a few secrets about life.#$e#You'll have to find out for yourself.
Entries.summer_Mon: #$1 LinusHeron#I saw a heron wading gracefully through the morning mist. Such are the treasures of a quiet life.$k#$e#It's so easy to get caught up in the noise of modern life. Your best years will pass you by in a formless blur. That's why you'v got to learn to slow down.
Entries.summer_Tue4: How have you been, my young friend?
Entries.summer_Wed6: Ah... summer. The warm sun heats up the cans for me.#$b#Then at night I've got a warm meal to look forward to.
Entries.summer_Thu4: I have my own reasons for living alone like this.#$e#Some things are best left unsaid...#$e#I should do some foraging.
Entries.summer_Fri4: Whenever you catch a fish, take a moment to thank it for its sacrifice.#$b#Even if you don't believe in the spirit of the fish, it's a good mental exercise. We need to be aware of our effect on the environment.
Entries.summer_Sat4: You can find rainbow trout in streams right now.
Entries.summer_Sun: This is an easier time of year for me. I don't have to worry about staying warm.#$e#Plus, the fruits of the wild are growing everywhere.
Entries.fall_Mon: I've explored deep into the caves.#$e#They hold some hidden secrets.#$e#Just be cautious if you go in there.
Entries.fall_Tue4: #$1 LinusFall1#Some joker sprayed paint all over my home during the night... It took hours to scrub it off this morning.$k#$e#I need to start gathering lumber for the winter.#$e#Do you have enough lumber to keep your house warm?
Entries.fall_Wed4: I don't have many responsibilities, so I spend my time thinking.#$e#You have to understand your thoughts before you can control them.
Entries.fall_Sun: I don't like to stay in one place for too long.
Entries.fall_Sun6: There's nothing quite like a feast of wild mushrooms in the fall.$h
Entries.winter_Mon: It can get really cold if you live in a tent.$s
Entries.winter_Tue4: Thanks for not shunning me, @. It takes a lot of wisdom to override your base instincts.#$e#I'm a human like everyone else. I just have a different lifestyle.
Entries.winter_Wed4: I'm sure you understand why I'm cautious of strangers.#$e#But let's put that in the past, okay? You and I are friends now, I think.
Entries.winter_Thu4: Winter is tough, but you can still fish and forage to get by.#$e#If you have any animals you should keep them inside.
Entries.winter_Fri4: The trees go to sleep during the winter. It makes it a bit lonely out here.#$e#But I wouldn't deny them their beauty sleep.$h
Entries.winter_Sat4: Thanks for stopping by. I was actually feeling a little lonely this morning.#$e#So, have you discovered anything interesting in the mines?
Entries.winter_Sun: Sleeping on the ground is good for my back.#$e#It's best to look at the positive side of things.$h

Entries.Introduction: Ah, Mayor Lewis told me you just arrived. I'm Marnie!#$e#I sell livestock and animal care products at my ranch. You should swing by some time.$h
Entries.Resort: Hehe... finally a chance to show off all my hard work at aerobics club.$h
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I feel warm.
Entries.Resort_Shore: Hee hee... It's interesting to see everyone in their bathing suits.
Entries.Resort_Bar: Phew... It's hot!$s
Entries.reject_789: Gah!$4#$b#...Um... What? Heh.. I don't know what that is...$3
Entries.Mon: I love animals, Mr. @. If you treat yours well I'm sure we'll become good friends!^I just love animals, Ms. @. Treat them kindly and we'll become friends, I'm sure!
Entries.Mon4: Animals are so innocent, so sweet. And If I don't look after them, who will?$s#$e#I just hope my chickens aren't too upset when I take their eggs.$s
Entries.Thu_2: You've been here a while, now... how's your farm doing?#$e#Taking care of animals is easy as long as you don't forget about them!$h
Entries.Saloon: Now that I'm here I can finally relax and socialize a bit.
Entries.Saloon_Tue: There aren't very many people here today...$s
Entries.Saloon_Wed: #$1 marnieAnimalSal#I spilled a whole bucket of milk on the floor today, it was horrible. And such a waste of my poor Belinda's hard work.$k$s#$e#It's nice of you to show up! It's a little more lively now.
Entries.Saloon_Thu: Phew! It sure feels good to kick back after a hard day's work.
Entries.Saloon_Fri: %Marnie doesn't seem to notice that you're there...
Entries.Saloon_Sat: I always see Clint here but he won't talk to anyone. He just glances over his shoulder now and then.$s
Entries.Tue: My nephew Shane has been staying at my place the last few months.#$e#He helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.
Entries.Wed: You can use a scythe to cut feed from grass.#$e#Or you can buy it from me, of course!$h#$e#I could use the cash...$u#$e#Adios.
Entries.Thu: Hi. Need something?#$e#I might be getting some different kinds of animals in the future.#$e#Although, I'll need to make sure there's a market for them, so you'll have to prove your skill with animals first.#$e#Just keep treating your animals with respect and good things will happen.
Entries.Fri: You can catch me at the saloon most nights.#$e#Animals are great company, but I need to spend time with people, too.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 marnieLike#I think someone in town has taken a liking to me. *teehee*$k$h#$e#I would be so lonely if Shane ever moved out.
Entries.Fri6: I wonder if Mr. Lewis gets lonely in that big house of his... $s#$e#It seems so empty in there, doesn't it?
Entries.Sat: Have you been to that strange tower west of my house?#$e#One time I heard this terrible, otherworldly noise coming from there.$s#$e#I would avoid that place if I were you...
Entries.Sun: Hey there, it's good to see ya!#$e#Feel free to visit us any time you please.
Entries.Sun8: Hi @!$h#$e#I'm glad we've become friends. I know I can trust you to take care of my dear animals.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining outside. Make sure you don't catch cold, dear.#$e#Stay indoors as much as possible.$h#$e#I worry about you sometimes!
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: It's raining! That means we don't have to water the crops today.$h#$e#Nature can be a big help sometimes.#$e#Have you fed the animals yet, honey?
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning! I woke up early from the sound of the rain and made you some breakfast. [194 195 210 211 216]  #$e#Stay warm and don't work too hard. I want you to stay healthy.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: What's on your agenda today, dear?#$e#I don't want to go outside in this weather... I'll just do some things around the house.#$e#Maybe I'll make something hot for dinner.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Maru: Despite all the technology we have, a rainy day is still the best tool for watering crops.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Abigail: The countryside looks more interesting on a day like this, don't you think?
Entries.Rainy_Day_Penny: I think I might do some baking today.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_Leah: Might want to do some fishing or mining today, huh?
Entries.Rainy_Day_Haley: Hmmph. If this weather keeps up I'll get too pale.$s
Entries.Rainy_Day_Harvey: Make sure you stay dry today, dear. I don't want you to become hypothermic.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Sebastian: I got up just before dawn and took a walk around the farm. It's really peaceful at that hour.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Alex: Hmm... I guess I'll have to do push-ups and sit-ups indoors today.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Elliott: The rain makes me think of my old life by the ocean.#$e#Change is part of life. That's okay.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Sam: I might spend some time today fixing any leaks in the roof or the windows.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Emily: I know you pride yourself on your work, but don't overdo it today. Okay, honey?$u
Entries.Rainy_Day_Shane: The roof's leaking? Ah well... a little mold never hurt anyone.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: The rain makes it feel like we're all alone.$l#$e#I'm cold... Aren't you ready to tuck into bed?$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Make sure you change into something warm. I don't want you to get sick.#$e#Can you hear the rain pattering on the roof, @?
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Ah...The soothing sound of rain overhead... I'm going to sleep well tonight.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: The rain makes our home seem so cozy.$h^It's nights like this I'm glad we have a quality roof.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I made some soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730]$h#$e#You need something hot on a day like this!$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Maru: Were you able to accomplish much today, hun?#$e#I tried to fix up some things around the house... you know, just little stuff.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Abigail: I'm ready to hop into bed whenever you are. The sound of rain will put us right to sleep.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Penny: Oh... the smell? I tried to do some baking... It didn't work out too well.$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_Leah: How was your day today, dear? Muddy?
Entries.Rainy_Night_Haley: Hi, honey. I'm so glad you're home. I was starting to get kind of lonely.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_Harvey: Hi. It's good to see you.$h#$e#I spent the day skimming through some medical journals.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Sebastian: I'll never grow tired of the rain... especially out here in the countryside.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Alex: Grandma always used to make hot stew on nights like this.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_Elliott: Sit down, relax! You've got to be tired after trudging through the mud all day.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Sam: Vincent called. He said he misses me and also to tell you hi.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_Shane: I just got off the phone with Jas and Marnie. They seem to be having a pretty good time without me.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Emily: Certain spirits only appear in the rain. Maybe you've heard their cries?
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Good morning ~<$h#$e#Ready for a hard day's work? I am.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hi, honey! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#You need food to stay energized throughout the day.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Did you sleep well?#$e#I've got some chores to do in here.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Did you have any strange dreams last night?#$e#I did, but all I remember is that it had something to do with a %adj %noun. Weird.$s#$e#Hehe. Dreams don't mean anything... do they, Honey?$l#$e#Well, we can't spend all day chit-chatting. You have work to do!
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, dear. Another day of farm chores, huh?#$e#I'll be cheering for you. <$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Maru: If you ever want to talk about how to maximize crop yield or anything... I'm open to that!
Entries.Indoor_Day_Abigail: There's always something new happening on our farm... I love it.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Penny: This place is so big compared to the trailer, I feel overwhelmed... In a good way!
Entries.Indoor_Day_Leah: Mind if I add some architectural flair to the woodwork around here? My chisel hand is itching!
Entries.Indoor_Day_Haley: I always feel happy on a sunny day.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Harvey: The sky looks great today... so clear!#$e#From now on, I'm only going to go into the clinic when I have appointments. Otherwise I can just work from home!
Entries.Indoor_Day_Sebastian: Well, this place sure beats my old basement room, doesn't it?$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Alex: The sun's shining and I'm bursting with energy! You'd better watch out! Heh Heh.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Elliott: I've been keeping a journal ever since we moved in together. Now that I actually have a life, I have lots to write about.$h#$e#I want to make sure I always remember these years.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Sam: There's too much stuff I want to get done today... Maybe I'll just watch TV instead.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Emily: By providing fresh, healthy produce to the community, we're doing a great service!
Entries.Indoor_Day_Shane: There's something special in the air... *sniff*... what is that? Oh...#$b#It's just this old corn chip I put in my pocket a few weeks ago. *crunch*
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Did you get everything done today, @?#$e#I did some house chores... but now I'm so tired.#$e#I'm ready for bed whenever you are.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Wow, you look like you did a lot of work today.#$e#Now you should just relax and kick back for the night.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I'm glad you're home.#$e#I get kind of scared alone at night.$s^I get lonely at night...$s#$e#...$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Are you done with your work for the day? I'm ready to have some fun.$h#$e#But if you're tired I understand.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: *phew*! I just finished my chores. Now we can spend some time together.$h#$e#So, tell me about your day.$l#$e#...$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Maru: You look like you're ready for bed, @. Should I lull you to sleep with the technical details of my latest project?$h#$e#*yawn*... To be honest, I'm kind of sleepy too.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Abigail: Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us...$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_Penny: Hi there, honey. Ready to spend a quiet evening at home?
Entries.Indoor_Night_Leah: It's so quiet and peaceful in the evening. Nothing to distract you from the experience of living.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Haley: You look like you've been working hard, dear. Let me help you de-stress.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_Harvey: You look like you could use a good massage tonight.$l#$e#Doctor's orders... It's good for the circulation!
Entries.Indoor_Night_Sebastian: #$c .5#I may be a reclusive guy, but I'm always happy when you're around.$h#$e#Hi, @. Good to see you. It's comforting when you're around.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Alex: My arms feel a little restless... How about a nice, deep massage?$l^I feel exhausted... That's a good sign! It means I worked hard enough today.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Elliott: #$c .5#You always smell so good after a day of hard work. It's your natural musk!^You smell sweet, my dear. Like a honeycomb drifting on a pool of spice tea.#$e#Come here, let me massage your back. You look tense.$l^You smell sweet, my dear. Like a cinnamon leaf floating in the summer breeze.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Sam: #$c .5#I wonder if the moon is visible tonight?#$e#So, did you get everything done on the farm today? If you didn't I won't be mad!
Entries.Indoor_Night_Emily: It's a very cozy house... I like it.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Shane: How was your day? Mine actually went pretty well.
Entries.Outdoor_0: It's a beautiful day today, isn't it?$h#$e#Days like this make work a little more pleasant.
Entries.Outdoor_1: I'm just going to relax and inspect the farm today, okay?#$e#It's just such a nice-looking area.$h
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, honey! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: I'm just going to do some dusting over here. That should help you out, right?#$e#*phew*... it's hot out here.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h
Entries.Outdoor_Maru: I like being out here. It's a good place to think about new inventions.$h#$e#I'm still hoping to come up with something to help you out in your work.
Entries.Outdoor_Abigail: I'm just going to hang out here, okay?#$e#There's a lot of interesting bugs and things out here. *chuckle*$h
Entries.Outdoor_Haley: Looks like a good day to work on my tan, don't you think, sweetheart?$h
Entries.Outdoor_Leah: Wow, this is great! I'm really starting to enjoy life on the farm, @.$h#$e#This is the life I've always dreamed of.$l
Entries.Outdoor_Penny: I'm really happy on our little farm, @.$h
Entries.Outdoor_Sebastian: This is so different from my old life, but I'm really starting to like it.$h#$e#I feel like I really belong here.$l
Entries.Outdoor_Harvey: This is so much nicer than being cooped up in the clinic all day.$l#$e#I love watching you on the farm... hehe
Entries.Outdoor_Elliott: Today, I'm going to continue writing my new novel. What better place than our wonderful farm?$h#$e#This is perfect.$l
Entries.Outdoor_Alex: I'm going to get a bunch of exercise today! Haha! I love living on a farm.$h
Entries.Outdoor_Sam: Hey, look at those puffy clouds in the sky, honey!$h#$e#I'm going to watch those for a while, if you don't mind.
Entries.Outdoor_Shane: I dunno if my lungs can handle this freshness. I'm still used to JojaAir.
Entries.Outdoor_Emily: You're doing great work, @. Keep it up.
Entries.jobLeave_Harvey: I have to go into the clinic today. Have a nice day, okay?
Entries.jobLeave_Penny: I have to go into town today. Don't work too hard, and eat something good for lunch!$h
Entries.jobLeave_Maru: I have to leave for work soon. I'll see you tonight. I'll be thinking of you!$h
Entries.jobReturn_Harvey: #$c .5#Hi, honey. How was your day?#$e#*Phew*... I'm exhausted...$s#$e#My patients are still healthy, so it was a good day.
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .5#Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours?$h#$e#Jas and Vincent weren't behaving very well today. I'm still all wound up...
Entries.jobReturn_Maru: #$c .5#Well, it was just another boring day at the clinic.#$e#Hey. Did you have a more exciting day than me? I hope so.#$e#$c .5#Well, It's time to kick back and relax. Did you leave me any dinner?#$e#I'm just looking forward to bed-time.$h
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you spent any time with %kid1 today?
Entries.OneKid_1: I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?
Entries.OneKid_2: Don't worry, I'll feed %kid1 today. You can just focus on running the farm.
Entries.OneKid_3: Life's a lot different now that we have a child.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfast. They were hungry!
Entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.TwoKids_2: You know, I think %kid2 has your nose.
Entries.TwoKids_3: A nice house, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. What's left?
Entries.Good_0: It's hard to believe we're finally married...$l
Entries.Good_1: You know, I always had a feeling we'd be together some day.$l
Entries.Good_2: Are you enjoying the married life, @?#$e#I am.$l
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today!$l^Wow, you look beautiful today.$l
Entries.Good_4: This place is my home now... I'm happy here.$l
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. It must have cost you a fortune!$l
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Entries.Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Entries.Good_8: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!$l
Entries.Good_9: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.#$e#It's a simple life, but I like it.$h
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.$s
Entries.Neutral_1: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?
Entries.Neutral_2: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...
Entries.Neutral_3: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.Neutral_4: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Entries.Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money, @?
Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Entries.Neutral_7: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.Neutral_8: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
Entries.Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Entries.Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.$s
Entries.Bad_2: Are you still happy with me?s
Entries.Bad_3: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.$s
Entries.Bad_4: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?$s
Entries.Bad_5: You used to be romantic... what happened?$s#$e#I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?$a
Entries.Bad_6: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$s
Entries.Bad_7: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s
Entries.Bad_8: You've been so cold to me lately...$s
Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better.$s
Entries.spring_1: Well, a new year has arrived. Do you have a plan for what you want to accomplish this year?#$e#I feel pretty hopeful.
Entries.spring_8: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.
Entries.spring_23: I hope you've been practicing your moves... tomorrow is the flower dance!
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get a heat stroke, dear.#$e#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
Entries.summer_8: Sorry if I smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.
Entries.summer_15: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
Entries.fall_1: This weather feels pretty nice after the heat of summer.
Entries.fall_8: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.
Entries.fall_15: Have you figured out what you're going to use for our grange display tomorrow?
Entries.fall_26: Should we go to the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night?
Entries.winter_1: Brrr.... It's cold. I guess winter has arrived.
Entries.winter_7: Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow?
Entries.winter_28: Thanks for a great year, @. I'm excited to tackle next year together.$l
Entries.spring_Maru: I'm feeling excited for a new year of farming, @!$h
Entries.spring_Abigail: I may like the colder seasons, but by the end I'm always glad to see spring arrive.
Entries.spring_Haley: Aren't you glad winter's over, honey? Things seem more hopeful now.
Entries.spring_Leah: Don't forget to look for wild horseradish, leeks and dandelions while you're out there!
Entries.spring_Penny: I'm so happy to see some greenery after that long white winter.
Entries.spring_Sebastian: Wow, my skin is pale... I guess I'd better help you with some farm work this season.
Entries.spring_Harvey: Let's plant some healthy vegetables this spring.$h
Entries.spring_Elliott: I'm looking forward to a beautiful year on %farm farm.$h
Entries.spring_Sam: *sniff* ... My doze is stubbed up... allergies.
Entries.spring_Shane: Maybe I'll learn a new skill this year...
Entries.summer_Maru: It's a good time of year to do some stargazing.
Entries.summer_Abigail: Oh man... I could go for some chocolate cake.
Entries.summer_Haley: You must know by now that summer is my favorite season.$h
Entries.summer_Leah: Nothing pairs so well with summer like a nice sweet wine. Don't you think, honey?
Entries.summer_Penny: Are you growing any melons this summer?
Entries.summer_Sebastian: I'm going to stay inside as much as possible this summer.
Entries.summer_Harvey: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, honey... That can really damage your skin.
Entries.summer_Elliott: One of the main things I miss about the ocean is the fresh fish.
Entries.summer_Alex: I always have the most energy in the summer.
Entries.summer_Sam: Summer always makes me want to eat more barbecue.
Entries.summer_Emily: Phew! It's hot but it feels great, doesn't it?#$e#Maybe we'll see some wild parrots today.
Entries.summer_Shane: What's on my agenda today... hmmm... #$e#I think I see some spicy pretzel snacks and a couple of 'cold boys' on the horizon.
Entries.fall_Maru: I'm glad I still work at the clinic... It's an important service for the community.
Entries.fall_Abigail: I hope we're growing pumpkins this year.$h
Entries.fall_Haley: I'm craving cake.#$e#But not just any cake... it has to be pink.
Entries.fall_Leah: Breathe deep... can you smell that? That tells me it's mushroom season.
Entries.fall_Penny: It's so peaceful out here on the farm. I never appreciated nature that much living in town.
Entries.fall_Sebastian: My mother used to always make this delicious pumpkin soup in the fall.
Entries.fall_Harvey: I could sure go for some wine.
Entries.fall_Elliott: Ah... Fall. The warm sun drifts low in the sky, casting long shadows over waving fields of gold.#$e#It's a beautiful time of year, don't you think?
Entries.fall_Alex: I feel weak... I need some protein.$s
Entries.fall_Sam: I wonder what's going on in the rest of the world? We're really secluded here.
Entries.fall_Emily: I drank a super-food smoothie this morning and I feel aaah-mazing!$h
Entries.fall_Shane: I think there might be a new species of fungus growing behind my mini-fridge.#$e#Ah well, 'tis the season, right?
Entries.winter_Maru: Spring is coming soon. I'm really looking forward to having rhubarb pie.
Entries.winter_Abigail: Remember when we played that 'Prairie King' game together, in my room? Those were good times.$h
Entries.winter_Haley: I was just thinking about the time you helped me open a jar of pickles.$h#$e#We've come a long way since then.$l
Entries.winter_Leah: I always start craving salad in the winter... Inconvenient, I know.
Entries.winter_Penny: I'm going to do a lot of reading this winter.
Entries.winter_Sebastian: I wonder what Sam's up to? We used to be really good friends.
Entries.winter_Harvey: Winter is flu season, so work is probably going to be a lot more stressful. Sorry in advance if I'm grouchy.
Entries.winter_Elliott: I think I might do some writing this winter. There's not much else to do, anyway.
Entries.winter_Alex: I hope my grandparents are doing okay. They used to rely on my help quite a bit. You know, with lifting heavy objects or whatever.
Entries.winter_Sam: I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family man now!
Entries.winter_Emily: Whoops, my hair is frozen solid again.$s
Entries.winter_Shane: There's a wide, wide world out there... but I'd rather stay in my room.
Entries.spouseRoom_Maru: #$c .5#I got up early to do a little star-gazing.#$e#I hope you don't mind if I spend some time on my projects today, honey.
Entries.spouseRoom_Abigail: #$c .5#I got up a little before you and fed David Jr. He's very active this morning.#$e#I hope you don't mind the guinea pig smell.
Entries.spouseRoom_Haley: #$c .5#Go ahead and start your day, honey. I'm just putting on my make-up.#$e#Have any plans for the day?
Entries.spouseRoom_Leah: #$c .5#One of these days I'll have to do your portrait.#$e#The view from this window is inspiring, don't you think?
Entries.spouseRoom_Penny: #$c .5#I always wanted my very own library. This is so charming.$h#$e#I like to do a little reading first thing in the morning. It gets my brain into gear.
Entries.spouseRoom_Sebastian: #$c .5#I'm debating whether I should work or just read comics all day.#$e#Hey, do we have any pizza in the freezer? I'm hungry.
Entries.spouseRoom_Harvey: #$c .5#No air-traffic this morning, honey. But it's still fun to break out the equipment now and then.#$e#I'm working on a new model plane. It's so much more relaxing here than in my old apartment.
Entries.spouseRoom_Elliott: #$c .5#I think I might do some writing today.#$e#Will you be okay without my help?
Entries.spouseRoom_Alex: #$c .5#Don't ever let me get lazy. I want to stay in good shape for you!#$e#There's lots of room here to do my exercises. I'm making more progress than ever!
Entries.spouseRoom_Sam: #$c .5#The old guitar... I don't have as much drive to play it anymore. That's fine.#$e#What's on your agenda today?
Entries.spouseRoom_Emily: I'm going to spend some time with the parrot today. It breaks my heart that he'll never fly again.$u
Entries.spouseRoom_Shane: #$c .5#Beer or cider? Sometimes life can be challenging.#$e#Hi, @. I'll just hang out in here today and uh... maybe sweep the floor a little bit or something.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Krobus: Ah, It's more humid today with the rain... I feel a lot more comfortable.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Krobus: The sound of the rain reminds me of the sewers... it's comforting.#$e#The sewers were my refuge... I felt safe there. But don't worry... I feel the same way about my new home, too.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Krobus: I wish I could help you on the farm, but I can't go out in the sun...
Entries.Indoor_Night_Krobus: Hi, @. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!$h
Entries.Outdoor_Krobus: On a day like this, I can enjoy the outdoors with you. This is really nice!$h#$b#Just let me know if you see anyone coming, so I can hide.$u
Entries.NoBed_0: Where am I supposed to sleep...?$s
Entries.NoBed_1: I wasn't able to sleep well last night...$s
Entries.NoBed_2: I had to sleep on the floor last night...$s
Entries.NoBed_3: Did something happen to our bed...?$s

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: The dark... the rain... it gets me excited.$l
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey, remember when we played that duet by the lake? This weather reminds me of that day.#$e#You really surprised me with that mini-harp... I never expected that. I guess that's why I like you so much.$l
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Hey! I woke up early and did some exploring on my own. I found this and it reminded me of you. [768 767 769 66 82]#$e#Think you can find something better than that? I'm not so sure!$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: It might be a good day to visit the caves, huh? Just be careful out there.#$e#If you go, bring a Life Elixir or two.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Maybe I'll boot up Journey Of The Prairie King today... one of these days I swear I'll beat it on my own.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_Abigail: The countryside looks more interesting on a day like this, don't you think?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: I was just gazing out into the rainswept woods... I swear I saw something darker than black shifting around the trees.$6
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: It's a good night to see a ghost...
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Can you feel it? There's a stillness in the rain...
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: On nights like this, I like to turn the light down low and just listen...$8
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I felt like making some soup for dinner. I hope it's not too disgusting. [199 218 219 727 730]$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: Hey! You look like you've been hard at work. Can I help you relax?^Have you been working hard? You look cute when you're a little exhausted.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_Abigail: The sound of rain should put us right to sleep tonight.
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I always loved this place, long before you moved in. Now I can explore the farm whenever I want!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, @. Heading out into the wild? I got you something...[286 287 205 732]#$e#Use that if you get into a tough spot. It should help keep you safe.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Heading to the mines? Hey... if you find something tasty, remember to bring me a piece!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Hey! I'm just debating what I should do today. I'm not used to having this much freedom!
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: You don't mind if I do some re-decorating now and then, do you? I'm still excited to have a place of my own to work on.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Abigail: There's always something new happening on our farm... I love it.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: I had a good day, today. There's always something interesting goin on around here, if you look close enough.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Hey! Tell me about your day. Did anything exciting happen?$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I used to be a night owl, but I'm starting to enjoy the rhythm of life on the farm. It feels natural.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: *yawn*... I'm ready to call it a night pretty soon.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: The sounds of the night are louder out here. I'll never stop enjoying that.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Abigail: Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us...$l
Entries.Outdoor_0: The soft breeze is blowing mountain air throughout the valley today. It smells like fresh pine and sage.
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hmm... I think we've got plenty of space for outdoor slime ranching!
Entries.Outdoor_2: Make sure to keep things tidy around your Grandpa's shrine. There's something special about it, I can feel it.
Entries.Outdoor_3: It's pretty cool that we have a cave on our property. It's something I always dreamed about.$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket. *rumble*$h
Entries.Outdoor_Abigail: I'm just going to hang out here, okay?#$e#There's a lot of interesting bugs and things out here. *chuckle*$h
Entries.funLeave_Abigail: I'm going in to town today, just so you know. I need to stretch these legs a bit.
Entries.funReturn_Abigail: Hey! Did you have a good day? Mine went well. It was refreshing to take a walk.$h
Entries.OneKid_3: I can't believe I'm a "mom"... life is weird.$h
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their chocolate cereal. They were screaming!
Entries.TwoKids_2: I had a dream that %kid2 will grow up to be a famous monster hunter. I've already been thinking about a little armor set.
Entries.TwoKids_3: A cool old house, a couple kids, and an amazing farm. I never thought I'd come this far... but, hey! Our lives are just getting started.$h
Entries.Good_1: Did you hear that? Sometimes I'm convinced this house is haunted.$u
Entries.Good_2: Welwick's horoscope predicted great things for me today. I feel really motivated!
Entries.Good_3: I can't even remember the last time I dyed my hair... I swear, it never fades from this color...
Entries.Good_4: I'm glad I owned a heavy pair of boots before moving in. It's hard to imagine tip-toeing around the mud in sneakers.$h
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me... I'll proudly wear this to my grave.$l
Entries.Good_6: Hey. I know you're smart, but I still worry about you sometimes. The world is full of monsters.$6#$e#Just promise me you'll be careful. I don't want to lose you.
Entries.Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for us. I'm really proud of you.$l
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and shriveled. It's going to happen some day!
Entries.Neutral_1: Do you think your Grandpa would be proud of us?
Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder how the old shop is doing? I should visit my parents again soon.
Entries.Neutral_7: If you moved on to the spirit world, I'd set up a little shrine for you next to Grandpa's.
Entries.Neutral_8: No matter how much we clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms are kind of dirty.
Entries.Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? I might get bored.
Entries.Bad_7: I used to be special to you, your best friend... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s
Entries.Bad_8: You've been so cold to me lately... What's wrong with you? You're acting like a bog spirit...$s
Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sebastian before we met. He was probably the one...$s
Entries.spring_1: So, do you have any big plans for the new year?
Entries.spring_12: Hey, the egg festival is tomorrow. I'm sorry, but I won't go easy on you because we're married!$h#$e#I plan on winning that egg hunt. Go ahead and try to beat me.
Entries.spring_2: Do you have any new year's resolutions? I'm trying to lose a few pounds around the middle.$h
Entries.summer_1: I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year.#$e#I hope you like me pale!$h
Entries.summer_4: Make sure you don't get a heat stroke, my love.#$e#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
Entries.summer_8: Sorry about the smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.
Entries.summer_15: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's fun!$h
Entries.fall_6: Ah... fall. This might be my favorite time of year. The colors really complement my hair, don't you think?
Entries.fall_1: The scent is unmistakable... mushroom, rotting leaves, pumpkin. It's fall, alright. Isn't it lovely?
Entries.fall_2: Can we grow giant pumpkins this season? Please, honey?$h
Entries.fall_20: Honey... you're worth more to me than a chest full of quartz.#$e#Now, a chest full of amethyst? Hmm... I'd have to think about that one.$h
Entries.winter_3: I actually like the cold weather. It just gives me an excuse to get cozy!$h
Entries.winter_15: It's fun to explore the valley in winter! Everything is so different under a blanket of snow. And so quiet...
Entries.spring_Abigail: I may like the colder seasons, but by the end I'm always glad to see spring arrive.
Entries.summer_Abigail: Oh man... I could go for some chocolate cake.
Entries.fall_Abigail: Do I smell pumpkin on you? Maybe I'm just dreaming...$h
Entries.winter_Abigail: Remember when we played 'Prairie King' together in my room, so long ago? Those were good times.$h
Entries.spouseRoom_Abigail: #$c .5#I got up a little before you and fed David Jr. He's very active this morning.#$e#I hope you don't mind the guinea pig smell.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: With all this space, I can really achieve a full body workout.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I never had many friends in town... I sometimes wonder how I'd end up if you never moved here.$9
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Aw... I was gonna do some jogging outside. But I can't really do it in this weather.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: *grumble*... I just woke up and I'm hungry for some protein.$9
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married guy!
Entries.patio_Alex: Unghh... one... Unghhh... two... It feels great to lift weights outdoors!$6
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Hey, did you have a good day? I'm sure tomorrow will be even better.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: How's it going? I've been carrying the old gridball around with me all day. A guy can pretend...$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay manly... Sorry.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I've been setting aside a few scraps for Dusty. He deserves a treat now and then.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I was hungry so I made some dinner. Here, I saved you a plate. [241 242 225 214 198]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Ahh... there's nothing like a good night's sleep next to my husband!$h^Ahh... there's nothing like a good night's sleep next to my wife!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, honey! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#If you want to get strong, you have to eat like you mean it!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Come here. *squeeze*... Mmhmm. You're firming up from all that farm work.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I'm still getting used to cooking and doing laundry... It's not exactly my favorite, but I knew what I was getting into when I married you.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: There's a couple things around the house that I'm going to try and fix today. Don't worry about me, I'm not bored.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: It feels good to push yourself to the limit, doesn't it? You'll really feel like you earned your place in the soft bed tonight.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Did you get a haircut or something? You're looking pretty good today. Maybe it's all that fresh air...$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Tell me all about your day. It's good to get everything off your chest now and then.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Hey... I got some new shorts. I thought you might be interested to know...$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: If you need some quiet time to yourself, that's okay with me.
Entries.Outdoor_0: Hey. When I stand here and look out over our land... I'm really proud. You've done great work.
Entries.Outdoor_1: This is a great place to raise children. I would've loved growing up in a place like this. So much room to run around!
Entries.Outdoor_2: I like to spend as much time outside as possible. It just feels better to be out here.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Look at us, with our little farm. We make a cute couple.$h^Hey. Maybe it's the golden light, but you look beautiful today.$l
Entries.Outdoor_4: Ahh... It feels great to be outside. Stardew Valley really is the most beautiful place...
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home dad.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like Daddy.
Entries.OneKid_3: I wonder what it's like to be pregnant...?$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: Maybe %kid2 will be the first professional gridball player from Pelican Town?$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: I finally have the family life that I missed out on as a kid... thank you.$l
Entries.Good_1: You're very handsome... have I told you that?$l^You're very beautiful... have I told you that?$l
Entries.Good_6: I know you're strong, but sometimes I worry that you might get eaten by slimes... or worse. Just be careful.$9
Entries.funLeave_Alex: I'm going into town today. I'll see you tonight.
Entries.funReturn_Alex: I had a good day. I like to see my grandparents often, they're getting pretty old.
Entries.spring_1: Finally, the snow has melted and the sun is back! My body feels great.$h
Entries.spring_6: I wonder if a powder of stardrop would help me bulk up...
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? I guess it'll be good to load up on the free eggs.
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I better do some extra push-ups tonight.$9#$e#Those jumpsuits are pretty tight... and everyone's going to be watching closely.
Entries.summer_1: Summer's a very energetic time of year, and body feels it too! I feel solid.
Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#I have no idea what's good... you're the chef!$h
Entries.summer_27: Aw... summer's almost gone. My muscles are starting to deflate...$s
Entries.fall_1: Well, summer's over... but I'm going to stay positive. The warmer seasons will always return.
Entries.fall_15: Tomorrow's the fair, are we going to go?#$e#I don't care one way or another.
Entries.fall_26: I hope my grandparents are doing okay. Grandpa's too cheap to turn on the furnace until the last minute.
Entries.winter_1: Make sure you stay warm this winter. I worry about your delicate skin.
Entries.winter_7: Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow? I think you can win it!
Entries.winter_28: It's been a great year, @. I'm looking forward to next year! Now, come closer... $l

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I feel inspired today... I think I'll do some writing.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: The sound of rain, in some tiny way, reminds me of my cabin by the beach.#$e#The farm is wonderful, but I do miss the sound of the ocean.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: I got up early and made coffee.[395]#$e#I find that a cup of this exquisite brew makes the early morning a lot more pleasant.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I think I'll remain indoors today, my dear. The rain causes my hair to go limp.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: My inspiration for writing is like the weather... it comes and goes at random. Today I feel entirely dull.$s#$e#Perhaps I'll read one of the classics to get my creative juices flowing.
Entries.patio_Elliott: Ah, what a lovely day to read a book... don't you think, my dear?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening. Did you have a productive day, @?^Good evening. Did you have a productive day, my dear?
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: You're ice cold! Let me keep you warm.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: My skill with words is unmatched, yet I can't find the way to properly describe your allure.$l^My skill with words is unmatched, yet I can't find the way to properly describe your beauty.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: What did I do today? I'll just say this... it takes a lot of work to maintain this rugged physique!
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I spent the afternoon daydreaming about the ocean. So I decided to cook some seafood. [198 202 727 728]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're together. The bachelor life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @! I made us a pot of coffee.[395]#$e#I find myself craving this robust flavor nearly every morning.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: If you find a spider in the house, don't squash it! Just let me know and I'll take the poor thing outside.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Today is going to be a fantastic day... I can feel it!$h#$e#I get this special feeling in my nose...
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I've had this recurring nightmare that you gave me a buzz cut... You wouldn't ever do that to me, would you?$s#$e#I trust you.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare to my wonderful man.$l^From the brightest winter star, to the fragrant fairy rose... nothing can compare with your captivating beauty.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: A crackling fire adds wonderful ambience to the house... every piece of wood burns in a unique way.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I never had much success growing plant in my old beach house. Hopefully I can pick up a thing or two by watching you.#$e#In this respect, you are the master and I only a humble apprentice.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: When I behold thy wondrous face, a precious jewel of form and grace, my heart... torn by the dread of night, is purified with golden light.#$e#Poetry is the only way I can begin to describe my feelings for you.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: My love... I wouldn't trade you for 100 iridium bars.#$e#Nor 1000...#$e#Not even 10,000 bars, no.$7#$e#...$7#$e#No, not even 100,000 bars!$a#$e#...$s#$e#Wa... one million bars of pure iridium...? Don't make me do this...$8
Entries.Outdoor_0: My wildest dreams have come true... just look at this incredible landscape!
Entries.Outdoor_1: Fertile soil beneath my feet, fresh air to fill my lungs, and the sun's warmth to delight my skin... Life is going well.
Entries.Outdoor_2: I might stay here and write some poetry. I'm feeling a sudden surge of creativity! You go on ahead and take care of business.
Entries.Outdoor_3: If I stay perfectly still, perhaps a resplendent butterfly will bless my nose with a landing.
Entries.Outdoor_4: I drank too much coffee... my mouth feels about as dry as the Calico Desert.$s#$e#Oh... sorry about the coffee breath.$7
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you had any time to entertain little %kid1 today? Maybe a second child will make things easier for both of us.
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to have the perfect childhood here. There's so much to explore.
Entries.OneKid_3: Caring for babies isn't exactly my strong suit... but I'll do my best to be a good father.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their food. They eat a lot for such small creatures!
Entries.TwoKids_1: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "Da...da".$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: I'm going to teach %kid1 to read as soon as possible! That's a great way for children to learn about the world.
Entries.TwoKids_3: We've done well, @. The farm is doing excellent and our healthy children are a great joy. I couldn't be happier.
Entries.Good_0: @... I'm so proud of all your hard work. I'm very lucky to have you.$l
Entries.Good_1: I made a whole secret book of poems expressing my love for you.$l
Entries.Good_2: I came to the valley to find the ivory tower from which my talents could reign supreme. But what I really found was a dungeon of loneliness. You saved me from that.$l
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave? Your jawline is perfect.$l^Your feminine allure is irresistible today. I can't keep my eyes off you.$l
Entries.Good_4: I feel burnt out in your absence. But when I hear that sound of muddy boots on wood, my heart rises from the ash.
Entries.Good_5: I'm doing a walking meditation. It's good for creativity.
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! I do worry about you sometimes. There are people in the world who would take advantage of you.
Entries.funLeave_Elliott: I think I'll walk down to the beach today. It's always nice to see the ocean again.
Entries.funReturn_Elliott: I had a nice time at the beach by myself. I watched the waves come and go, just like old times.
Entries.spring_1: My new year's resolution is to write, write, and write! I can never stop improving my skills.
Entries.spring_12: It's strange, but I often have cravings for pomegranate in the spring.
Entries.spring_23: I look forward to dancing with you tomorrow, my dear.
Entries.summer_1: It's hard to be in a foul mood when the sun is beaming and the butterflies are dancing on a spice-berry breeze.$h
Entries.summer_10: I was going to grab an extra bottle of ink from my cabin today, but then I remembered the Luau is tomorrow. I'll just do it then.
Entries.summer_27: All good things must come to an end, including the joyful days of summer. The key to happiness is to accept change without judgement.
Entries.fall_1: The splendor of fall... a verdant banquet for all the senses to enjoy... has inspired some of the greatest poetry of all time.
Entries.fall_15: I might set my pride aside and sink my eager teeth into a sloppy, saucy barbecue sandwich tomorrow.
Entries.fall_26: Would you still love me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a man has primitive urges...
Entries.winter_1: Winter is a great time to read books and play the piano. Remember to pause and enjoy a quiet moment or two.
Entries.winter_7: I'm a little out of practice, but I plan on entering the fishing contest tomorrow! You've got some stiff competition, dear.
Entries.winter_28: Happy new year's eve, my dear. Please accept this to celebrate. [348]

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I wonder where the flying insects go when it rains? Don't they get hit by the raindrops?

Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I saw a wild rabbit today. I just wish I could pet one someday. They look so soft...

Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Entries.Neutral_7: I don't really feel like doing anything today.

Entries.Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.$s
Entries.Bad_2: Are you still happy with me?s

Entries.Bad_4: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?$s
Entries.Bad_5: You used to be romantic... what happened?$s#$e#I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?$a
Entries.Bad_6: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$s

Entries.spring_2: So, what are we planting this season?
Entries.spring_1: That was some way to ring in the new year last night...$l
Entries.spring_15: *sigh*... I guess it's time for the 'spring cleaning' again.$s

Entries.spring_2: So, what's your strategy for optimizing the farm this year?
Entries.spring_1: It's wonderful to see all the plants and animals come back to life during the spring.

Entries.summer_2: I like to catalogue the different insects I see in summer.

Entries.Rainy_Night_0: How was your day, honey? I spent my afternoon reading a novel.

Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I love to hear about all the artifacts you've found. Archaeology is fascinating!#$e#To think... there may have been farmers at this very spot 10,000 years ago.

Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Ready to tuck in? I made the bed and everything...$11

Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to have such a great childhood here.

Entries.Good_4: This place is really starting to feel like home.$l

Entries.spring_15: Ah, the 'spring cleaning'... I'm actually going to enjoy this.

Entries.fall_2: Will you grow any giant pumpkins this year?$11
Entries.winter_1: Winter's a good time to unwind a bit. You deserve it after the long year!

Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Ready to hit the hay? I actually made the bed for once...

Entries.winter_7: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? It might be fun to see everyone again...

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Finally... some heavy rain. I get bored of sunny weather easily.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey. I was just thinking about my old room in the basement. I felt comfortable there, but this is a lot more interesting. And I don't miss the smell...#$e#I felt kind of embarrassed living in my mom's house for so long.

Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Maybe a witch will visit us tonight? Hah.. if only life was that interesting...
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: The older I get, the less I'm drawn to the city. It had a certain mystique to it, once. But it turns out that was just a romantic fantasy.#$e#The city's so busy, so full of people... I don't belong there. I'm a loner.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey... want some coffee?[395]$7#$e#I needed some... woke up early from a nightmare and I just couldn't fall back asleep.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I couldn't sleep last night so I went for a night ride on the motorcycle.#$e#I need to stay independent, even though we're married. That's just how I am. I still love you, though.$7

Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Living here with you is teaching me to come out of my shell a little bit. I think it's good for me.$7

Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Maybe I drank too much coffee... I don't feel very tired.#$e#I'm still trying to adjust to the farm schedule. I used to stay up until 5am and sleep in until 2pm, sometimes.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: It's really cool to have our own place. I can do whatever I feel like and not have people nagging at me all the time.#$e#I'm sure Maru's happy that I'm gone.
